sqlMap.sql: insert into PAY_SERVICE_APPLY_APPROVAL ( APPLYNO, APPLYUSERID, APPLYUSERNAME, RESULT, REMARK, APPLYTIME ) values ( :applyNo, :applyUserId, :applyUserName, :result, :remark, :applyTime )

select APPLYNO as applyNo, APPLYUSERID as applyUserId, APPLYUSERNAME as applyUserName, RESULT as result, REMARK as remark, APPLYTIME as applyTime from PAY_SERVICE_APPLY_APPROVAL WHERE APPLYNO=:applyNo order by APPLYTIME desc
